{{drawgraph:

target.1 =
    function:mean,
    value:value,
    series:machine.memory.ram.available|m,
    query:'SELECT mean(value) FROM "machine.memory.ram.available|m" WHERE "gid" = "106" AND "nid" = "2" AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "gid", "nid"',
    groupby:gid nid,
    condition:gid={gid} AND nid={id},
    alias:Ram available,
    interval:1m,

target.2 =
    function:mean,
    value:value,
    series:machine.memory.swap.left|m,
    groupby:gid nid,
    condition:gid={gid} AND nid={id},
    alias:Swap available,
    interval:1m,

target.3 =
    function:mean,
    value:value,
    series:machine.memory.swap.used|m,
    alias:Swap used,
    groupby:gid nid,
    condition:gid={gid} AND nid={id},
    interval:1m,

cfg.title = 'Memory'
cfg.dashboardtitle = 'Node {nodename} ({gid}:{id}) Memory 2'
cfg.height = 275px
cfg.width = 500px
cfg.stack = true
cfg.fill = 3
cfg.y_format = mbytes

}}
